text:
The weekly public grievances meetings, chaired by the District Collector every Monday, would remain suspended until further notice in view of the announcement of the Assembly election.

The monthly special mass contact programmes and the farmers grievances meetings would also remain suspended. However, a complaint box has been placed at the District Collector’s office wherein members of the public can deposit their petitions, Collector K.S.Palanisamy said in a press release.
title: No more grievance meetings
